desc: This course introduces students to poetry from a range of perspectives including, but not limited to the poet's life; the application of categories of analysis such as race, gender, and nationality; poetry as literary craft; and the aesthetic appreciation of poems. To experience the literary medium of poetry in the fullest sense, students are required to write about, memorize, orally interpret/recite, and compose their own poetry.
name: Intro to Poetry
notes: Open only to first-year students and sophomores. This course has class-year limits.
title: Introduction to Poetry
